Author: Solar_ashh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,234Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Summary; Jason Todd was dead; reborn into Jason Al Ghul… Talia’s eldest son, and the heir to the Demons head. The leagues general and the older brother to it’s prince - the man loved, oh so, dearly by the lady of Gotham… the undergrounds Prince, and the street rat ignored on the surface. BTW: Lady Gotham isn’t an actual thing/character/presence like no one ‘mentions’ her, it’s just a metaphor. entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,585Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 105

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,081Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: In Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: AnonDude

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,092Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 38

Summary: Red Robin has settled into life with Jay, and they've gotten a better grasp on their identity, but there are still a lot of questions to be tackled. What is their new understanding of their gender going to mean for the rest of their life? Do they want to come out? To family? To friends? Do they want to come out at work, come out to the public, where there will no doubt be endless scrutiny and unwanted opinions? And if the answer to any of those is yes, then how?On the more fun side, however, there's also still a whole lot of experimenting with their presentation to be done in their spare time to see what they actually like, and Jay is certainly an appreciative audience.

entry.title: rainy days
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,216Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 1,603

Summary: "So, maybe you've found your home here in Gotham. At least it's not that far, compared to Kansas." Bruce's voice is smooth and steady, his tone low.It's hard to keep a straight face at that.Clark's lips curve into a fond smile as he chuckles and shakes his head, leaning back against his seat, a hand rubbing across the nape of his neck."Yeah. Maybe I have. The coffee's great here. And the company is really nice." Clark offers a smile as he meets Bruce's eyes, holding his gaze for a beat too long before returning it to his pie.He doesn't miss the way Bruce's heart rate stutters at his comment.--Or, Clark Kent can't do one night stands, and Bruce is just his usual human disaster.(This story officially ends at Chapter 5.Everything after that will be extra chapters, which I'll post whenever I feel like it!)

entry.title: Shadows of Wayne: A Dark Reflection
entry.summary:
Author: theyfwmotherraven

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,626Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 152

Summary: In a world where Batman is dead, his children carry on the legacy in the shadows. When they kidnap an alternate Bruce Wayne who never donned the cape, they find a man more open, more trusting, and a far better father.Or,But only one chose to love him in the light. The other, consumed by darkness, loved Bruce to the point of madness.The contrast between the two Alfreds was stark. In the dark universe, Alfred's love had become a cage, bond to trap Bruce in a web of obsession and control, after his AUs death. He wouldn't make the same mistake again. None of them would as soon as Bruce was back in their graspOR,Bruce's breath catches as reality sinks in. Someone not only managed to take him down, but they'd also been in his home. With his kids. Fear shoots through him - how long had he been out? What if they'd come downstairs? His protective father instincts flare up despite his pain.Bruce carefully shifts his position, trying to sit up without waking the kids. He needs to assess the situation, find out what happened and who did this. His hand reaches out, fingers brushing against something cold and metallic on the floor. "What the..." He freezes as he sees it - a syringe.

entry.title: one day i am gonna grow wings (this is how it feels to take the fall)
entry.summary:
Author: no_imnotafraidtodisappear

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,943Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Neil Josten wasn’t stupid.Neil Josten knew how to nurse himself back to health after that night in January. He made his own suits, he made his own webs. Neil Josten put his life back together piece by piece, all by himself.Neil Josten had survived.Even so Neil Josten knew he should’ve kept running. Neil Josten should’ve known his time was running out. Neil Josten should’ve heeded his mother’s advice instead of sticking out like a sore thumb, even with his mask on.No, Neil Josten wasn’t stupid. Neil Josten was dumb.-------------------------Neil is Spider-man. Something bad happens. Neil is now in New Jersey. And another universe. A lot of problems arise. this fic is inspired by both of these fics:Hope Was A Dangerous, Disquieting Thing by BisexualChaosDemonLeap of Faith by alighterwood and ErinWantsToWrite
